response.original_title: The Triumphant Union and the Canadian Confederation (1863-1867)
response.overview: This installment of a documentary series from the late 1960s presents a fascinating study of the great and enduring principles of international relations. Through this close look at Canada and the American Civil War, and the relationship between Canada, Britain, the North and the South, we get a sense of the delicate balance between war and peace, and the diplomacy involved.
response.title: The Triumphant Union and the Canadian Confederation (1863-1867)
